parameters.name: ChildNick
parameters.description: The display name of the member. This helps clarify the scenario in which the account is used.

parameters.name: ChildUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used as the member.

parameters.name: ParentUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used as the management account.

parameters.name: PermissionCodes
parameters.description:
The permissions that can be modified. Valid values:

*   SYNCHRONIZE_FINANCE_IDENTITY: allows the credit control identity to be shared with the member.
*   SYNCHRONIZE_FINANCE_DISCOUNT_POLICY_TO_TARGET: allows the discount policy to be shared with the member.
*   FORBID_WITHDRAW_CASH: does not allow the member to withdraw the balance.
*   FORBID_MANAGE_INVOICE: does not allow the member to manage invoices.
*   CHECK_FINANCE_INFO: requests to view information about the financial relationship.
*   MANAGE_TARGET_INVOICE: allows the member to manage invoices.
*   CHECK_TARGET_CONSUMPTION: allows the member to view the bills.

parameters.name: RelationId
parameters.description: The ID of the financial relationship. Set this parameter to the value of the relationId response parameter returned by calling the QueryRelationList operation.

parameters.name: RelationOperation
parameters.description:
The operation to be performed. Valid values:

*   ADD
*   DELETE

parameters.name: RelationType
parameters.description: The type of the financial relationship. Set the value to enterprise_group.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request. The ID is used to mark a request and troubleshoot a problem.

parameters.name: RoleCodes
parameters.description: The roles that can be assigned to the member. You cannot modify the roles.
